name: FALLEN STARS (Demo)
description:
• CONTROLS
  1. Move   < arrows>
  2. Jump Space bar or Shift
  3. Dash  Q + <arrows> 

Two travelers whiz around the galaxy with their own spaceship, when unexpectedly the vehicle breaks down, all the pieces lost in space will be needed to rebuild the spaceship

Made during the GDevelop game jam 2022, My first game released on itch.io, hope you enjoy this
